item.description:
as a possible reference point for topics to talk about check this out:

We Are Change Ireland Confronts Gerry Adams (Sinn Fein, IRA)
http://www.youtube.co...

anyone here willing to actually step away from there computers and actually do something please contact me.

talk is cheap... internet chatter is cheaper!

-mark o


FORUM: A public address by: Gerry Adams, President of the Sinn Féin Party Member of Parliament, West Belfast

Time: 06:00 PM
Location: JFK Jr. Forum

A public address by: Gerry Adams, President of the Sinn Féin Party Member of Parliament, West Belfast
